definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life

sentences.english: I love their Asian desserts, particularly the hot tofu with sweet ginger sauce.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡他們的亞洲甜點，特別是甜薑汁熱豆腐。

sentences.english: Daeji Gal-bi is the choice pork ribs specially hand filleted, marinated in the sweet soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 醃製在甜醬油裏的豬肉，喫起來又有另一番風味。

sentences.english: Drink fewer sodas and other sweetened drinks, like iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 少喝蘇打汽水和其他甜飲料，比如冰茶。

sentences.english: It~s bitter, sour and peppery, but also sweet.
sentences.chinese: 這是苦的，酸和暴躁，而且甜。

sentences.english: EVOIL? ALMOND exhibits greater stability over time due to the addition of natural tocopherols.
sentences.chinese: 通過添加天然生育酚，甜杏仁油的穩定性很強。

sentences.english: They are the first to smell the sweet new grasses and the willow catkins.
sentences.chinese: 他們是聞甜的新草和柳樹柳絮花的第一。

sentences.english: Sugar is not so sweet to the palate as sound to the healthy ear.
sentences.chinese: 糖對於一個健康的耳朵聽上去並不像名字那麼甜。

sentences.english: Features Xiantian moderate Maotai rich, unique flavor.
sentences.chinese: 特點鹹甜適中，醬香濃郁，風味獨特。

sentences.english: Our sour taste can be sweetened with a little honey for those that prefer it.
sentences.chinese: 對喜歡的人來說，我們的酸味可以用一些蜂蜜來加甜。

sentences.english: Making a tea of a half-teaspoonful of turmeric and some honey to sweeten works well, too.
sentences.chinese: 放半匙薑黃和一些蜂蜜的甜茶也有很好的效果。

sentences.english: I believe that punishing them by depriving them of sweet things only develops greediness.
sentences.chinese: 我想，罰孩子不喫甜餡餅，只能增強他們的貪慾。

sentences.english: This sweet, thick drink is made of ice cream and milk.
sentences.chinese: 這種又甜又濃的飲料是由冰淇林和牛奶製成的。

sentences.english: The whole ocean is salty, and you are trying to be sweet.
sentences.chinese: 整個海洋是鹹的，而你卻想成爲甜的。

sentences.english: It's dessert time at Tia Si Si Hong Kong Delicious.
sentences.chinese: 現在是甜思思香港甜品時間。

sentences.english: Got some sweet pictures of the half-moon and the valley crest and the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 有半月形和谷波峯和雲的一些甜圖片。

sentences.english: It is as sweet as sucrose, has no after-taste and is safe for diabetics.
sentences.chinese: 這是蔗糖甜的，沒有後味，是糖尿病患者的安全。

definition: to snore/thirsty from excessively salty or sweet food/(dialect) very/extremely
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
